title: How do I check balance in my BMS Cash? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
It's pretty easy. All you need to do is log-in to your BookMyShow Account via App or Website and go to your - 'Profile' - 'Account & Settings' - 'Saved Payment Modes' - 'QuickPay'.
On the top you shall be able to see the BMS Cash balance amount as well as a detailed ledger once you click on it.
